data.title: Watch — Potentially Dangerous
data.text:
PBS Station Broadcasts

We will update airdates as they come in. Be sure to check local listings and add the title to your PBS watchlist. If you don’t see your local station listed and would like the film available in your region, email zach@potentiallydangerousfilm.com

Click HERE for a full list of current airdates

Screenings, DVDs, & Streaming

Use our online form to book an educational, nonprofit, corporate, or community screening.

Click our Donate tab above and follow instructions to make a contribution and receive a DVD as our thank you (for individual home use only).

For educational, group, community, library, and event licensing please click our Store tab.
